option.name: myStatusName
option.value: Will be merged with property conflicts

task.summary: Default task
added plt.show() to show the graph in pychar added examples for the github-API: octikit - github3 - pygithub - no API, JSON only
adapted github3 import
added norming of the integer attributes temporarily removed numBranches from IntegerAttribute because a new request was created
added unclassified_repos.csv
added documentation for io_agent.py
create vocab-directory if needed
alternative to divide with the number of hits instead of the number of words
added matplotlib-examples for kivy
example for a pie-chart in kivy
created initial gui_prototype - general layout - matplotlib.plot integration
added a csv with roughly 10000 random repos via the ghtorrent wep-api + now all repos from appendix b are predicted

corrected DOC to DOCS in appendix_b.csv corrected OTHERS to OTHER in category.py added connectToGithub in io_agent.py changed getWordOccurence to keep it as is added verity matrix comparision in prototype
refactored the prototyp.py to the class RepoClassifierNearestNeighbour
added main.py which demonstrates the usage of the classifier as well as voabList.dump
added list of the top 100 github-Languages added predic_prob output for nearestCentroid in predict_from_URL() added prediction from Owner & Name
now the print() function is redirected to the terminal button in the gui-concept
overloaded the print() function for the official gui -> ctrl+c and ctrl+v is now working thanks to import clipboard ;)
added example of plotting multidimensional data
resolved naming issues for widgets in .kv
removed our addations to appendix b renamed getFeatures() to getIntegerFeatures() seperated trainModel() into loadTrainingData() and trainModel() added bUseStringFeatures() as an additional Attribute
connected gui with prototype now prototype is a sub-folder of gui
added missing .py in utility_funcs/
added menubar, icon, settings popup, saved the api_token status for further reference
filled the info screen, added logos
prevented save popup from breaking the App, changed small details on the GUI
fixed a bug where changing the settings would crash. introduced a new one instead.
moved logos in media, added logos, improved info screen
minor Info Popup fixes
added close buttons to popups, renamed the tabs
deleted build directory
added the wordcloud
added masks to the Wordcloud
added examples to the ActionBar
